issue.title: [Plasma] Sorting example for DataFrames in plasma
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1333](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1333). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a adding an example on how to sort a large data frame example in memory with Plasma and python multiprocessing.
